title: Uttar Pradesh backs hybrid tax waiver in win for Toyota, blow for Tata
description: Uttar Pradesh will uphold its decision to waive registration taxes for hybrid cars, benefiting Toyota but disappointing Tata Motors and Mahindra & Mahindra. Despite lobbying from Hyundai, Tata, and Mahindra to reverse the decision, state officials confirmed no rollback. The tax waiver makes hybrid cars up to 10% cheaper, potentially influencing other states.
